text: qalat lahum rslhm: 'afi allah webadth -whdh- ryb, wahu khaliq alsmwat walard, wmnshyhma min aledm ealaa ghyr mithal sabq, wahu yadeukum 'iilaa al'iyman; liaghfir lakum dhnwbkm, wywkhr bqa'km fi aldunya 'iilaa ajl qddarh, wahu nihayat ajalkm, fala yueadhibkum fi aldnya? faqaluu lrslhm: ma nrakm 'iilaa bshrana sfatkm ksfatna, la fadal lakum ealayna ywhlkm 'ana takunuu rsla. turidun 'an tmnewna min eibadat ma kan yebdh abawna min al'asnam walawthan, fatuna bihujat zahirat tashhad ealaa sihat ma tqwlwn
